name: Where Are My Babies!?
description:
Mama Raccoon wakes up to find her precious little babies missing! Who took them? Who has answers? Who needs a smash to the head?

Controls:

Move: WASD or arrow keys

Jump: spacebar (hold to go higher)

Interact: E

Attack: left click or .

Dash: right click or l-shift

Directional dash: Hold a direction key and dash

Directional attack: Hold a direction key and attack

Authors:

Oliver Dai

Katie Dai
